projects.title: Income Prediction
projects.key_responsibilities: Led development of ML model for 'Income Prediction' project, handling 2L+ instances, 40+ features. Applied rigorous cleaning, preprocessing, and feature engineering to optimize data quality. Executed cross-validation and fine-tuning with the Random Forest Model, achieving accuracy, precision, and recall of 96%.

projects.title: Line Guided Load Shifter
projects.key_responsibilities: Developed and implemented a line-guided load shifter for pick-and-place operations. Collaborated with team members to meet project objectives.

projects.title: Gold Stock Price Forecasting
projects.key_responsibilities: Implemented time series forecasting techniques to predict gold prices. Analyzed time-dependent patterns for strategic decisions and risk management.

projects.title: Pothole Detection
projects.key_responsibilities: Trained a YOLOv5 model on a custom dataset, achieving precise pothole identification and localization. Deployed the model on a website for real-time detection.

experience.responsibilities: Utilized Jupyter Notebook and Google Colab for dataset examination. Conducted data pre-processing, EDA, ML model selection, training, and cross-validation.

awards_and_achievements.title: Winner of Impetus Project Competition
awards_and_achievements.description: Showcased exceptional skills in innovation, problem-solving, and project execution.

awards_and_achievements.title: Research Paper Published
awards_and_achievements.description: Published Research Paper on Line-Guided Load Shifter in Conference Proceedings.

awards_and_achievements.title: Awarded Concession Certificate
awards_and_achievements.description: Awarded Concession Certificate for Line-Guided Load Shifter Project at Expo 2023.

extracurricular_activities.activity: Coordinated and managed various athletic events and initiatives at IET, Kannad.
